name: Helmet
description:
An exciting twist on a classic game! Drop obstacles and pickups to hurt or aid the AI character, and score points based on damage and time remaining! Plan ahead your moves to bait traps, outsmart the AI and get a high score!

Producer:
Jamie
Programmers:
Stanley, Lewis
